text: Guangnan East Circuit or Guangnan East Province was one of the major circuits during the Song dynasty. Its administrative area corresponds to roughly the modern Chinese province of Guangdong (minus Leizhou Peninsula). Guangnan East Circuit and Guangnan West Circuit were split from Guangnan Circuit in 988. == See also == * Lingnan culture * ==References== * * Category:Circuits of the Song dynasty Category:988 establishments Category:10th-century establishments in China Category:1278 disestablishments in Asia Category:13th-century disestablishments in China
title: Guangnan East Circuit
